The Content of others In all the services that we are providing much of the content is produced by uses, publishers and other third parties. Whether the content that is posted publicly are sent privately, the content is the sole responsibility of the person or organisation that submitted it. So we cannot take the responsibility of any content that other people provide through the services.Through our terms of services and our community guidelines, we make clear that we dont want the services Put to bad users. But because sometimes we dont review all of the content, we cannot guarantee that content on the services will always conform to our terms of services and our community guidelines.

Community Guidelines At CraGee App, it is our responsibility to create a safe environment that excites your creativity and expression. CraGee App is intended to encourage the exchange of perspective, transcending a diverse array of cultures and beliefs.\nCraGee App Community Guidelines are updated from time to time in order to create a safe and friendly environment.\n If it is found that any of our users have violated our guidelines, this may result in your account and/or content being removed. In addition, users must also follow their local laws, and are also advised to acquaint themselves with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. CraGee App reserves the right to monitor and report content to authorities, as permitted by applicable law Respect the CraGee App Community： CraGee App is intended to be the place where people having varied ideas, cultures and beliefs come together. The CraGee App Community embraces diversity, and in doing so, prohibits opinions, thoughts and behaviour that violate another’s rights. Specific examples of such behaviour/opinion include
A. Discrimination or hate speech The CraGee App Community is inclusive. In this app, all users should feel free to express their opinion on different issues based in the country or globally but at the same time posting, sharing, or sending any content that incites hatred against a group of people based on their race, ethnicity, religion, nationality, culture, disability, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, age, or material that may in any other manner lead to, or encourage discrimination. B. Insults to National Honour CraGee App prohibits any activity which insults national symbols, national icons or promotes animosity against the Indian (or any other) state through calls for violence. Such activity includes, but is not limited to.\n Posting, sharing or sending anything that shows disrespect to the national flag, such as burning, mutilation, defacing, defiling, disfiguration, destruction or trampling. Similarly, any instances which display disrespect to the national emblem, national anthem, the Constitution of India or any other national symbol.\n Posting, sharing or sending any content that creates animosity, excites disaffection and promotes violence against the Indian state or in any manner seeks to threaten national integrity through violence against the nation.
C. Harmful or dangerous content CraGee App prohibits posting or sharing content that could harm other users or encourage them to harm themselves – whether physically, emotionally, financially or legally. A few (non exhaustive) examples of prohibited conduct and content are set out below:\n Acts that amount to intimidation or threatening other people, such as through threats of physical harm.\n Content that depicts dangerous acts, self-injury, or suicide, or provide any content that encourages other people to engage in such activities.\n Content that encourages the use and/or sale of weapons, bombs, drugs, or any other regulated goods prohibited by local laws.\n Content posted by Criminals and/or terrorist organizations and individuals.\n Content that encourages or promotes online gambling or other such financial schemes.\n Content that shows/encourages/involves illegal activities.\n
D. Graphic or shocking content CraGee App neither promote nor allow the users to post graphic, violent, shocking, or sensational content. Some specific examples of prohibited content are set out below:\n Posting, sharing or sending any violent, graphic, shocking, or sensational content, or any content that incites others to commit acts of violence. While considering whether your content could be classified under this category, please keep in mind that some people and groups will be more sensitive than others.\n Posting, sharing or sending content that may glorify, glamourize or in any way encourage the adoption of shocking or dangerous actions.\n Posting, sharing or sending any content which in any way involves or encourages activities such as stalking, or is generally invasive of another person’s privacy.\n
E. Child safety infringement If CraGee App become aware of content that in any manner sexually exploits, targets, or endangers children, we will report cases to law enforcement agencies and or take other appropriate action. There are some specific examples of such prohibited conduct are:
Sexually explicit content featuring minors or content that sexually exploits minors.\n Content about online dating with minors, compensated dating, invasion of a minor’s privacy, or other content that endangers minors’ physical and mental health.\n CraGee App may remove access to posts containing nudity, sexually suggestive acts, or unintentionally provocative content involving minors which could be used by others in unanticipated ways.\n
F. Pornographic Material, Nudity or sexual activity CraGee App does not allow users to post, share or send sexually explicit content or content intended for sexual gratification. If something should not be done or shown in public view, don’t post it. Specific examples of prohibited conduct and content are set out below:\n Content that contains, promotes, or encourages sexual assault, sexual abuse, sexual exploitation, or sexual violence.\n Explicit content, sexual content, provocative content or nudity.\n Content related to prostitution, solicitation, or any other types of sex trade.\n
G. Harassment or cyberbullying our users are requested to keep their interactions civil and treat all users with respect. Specific examples of prohibited conduct and content are set out below:\n Use of public posts and/or private messages to harass other people.\n Disclosures of anothers’ personally identifiable information, including address, phone number, email address.\n Deliberately degrading, humiliating, defaming, or bullying other people, or encouraging another user to do so.\n
H. Impersonation, spam, scams, or other misleading content CraGee App values high-quality, engaging content. Spam, fake, fraudulent, or misleading content, is prohibited on our platform. Specific examples of prohibited conduct and content are:\n
Impersonation of another individual or organization by the creation of fake identities, fake accounts, false representations of a connection with another organisation, or posting of misleading content to make money.\n Creating artificial online traffic by unfair/artificial means, such as trading comments, hiring others or being hired to write comments, sharing repetitive content, sending chain letters, and using deceptive information to encourage views, likes or comments.\n Posting comments or conducting any activity that harms members of the CraGee App community, e.g. defrauding users through phishing schemes.
I. Intellectual property CraGee App respects Intellectual Property of its users and of third parties. We also expects its users to do the same, and in doing so requests users not to:\n Post, share, or send any content that violates someone else’s copyrights, trademarks, or other intellectual property rights.\n Post, share or send another person’s work or content falsely representing it as their own.\n
J. Content about Smoking, Alcohol, Drugs or other banned substances CraGee App is not the platform to promote, encourage or glorify the sale or consumption of tobacco products, e-cigarettes, vapes/vapourisers, alcohol, drugs or any other banned products. Examples of such prohibited activities include:\n Posting, sharing or sending any content that depicts smoking or consumption of other tobacco products in a glorificatory or glamorous manner.\n Posting, sharing or sending any content that promotes the consumption of alcohol.\n Posting, sharing or sending any content that depicts the sale or consumption of illicit drugs or similar such banned substances
K. Other malicious activity Interferes with CraGee App’s daily operation, such as hacking its app or associated networks, or bypasses its measures to restrict users’ access.\n Distribution of files that contain viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs, or other material that is malicious or technologically harmful.\n Use of automated scripts to collect information about uses from CraGee App.
Upholding our Community Guidelines All CraGee App users must follow the policies set forth in the CraGee App Community Guidelines. If any of our users violates these guidelines, or if we receive a valid and properly scoped request from law enforcement bodies or other authorized entities, we investigate the case and take proper action. Depending on the severity of the violation and a user history on our app, we may take one or more of the following enforcement measures:\n
Limiting visibility: We may reduce the distribution of the content that may not be appropriate for all audiences. This makes content less visible on the Popular page or only visible to your followers.
Removing content:When we believe there is a genuine risk of physical harm or direct threats to public safety, we will report the case to law enforcement bodies as permitted by local laws.
Suspending an account:This is our most severe enforcement action. When an account is suspended, it is removed from the platform and the violator will not be allowed to create new accounts.
Reporting to law enforcement bodies:When we believe there is a genuine risk of physical harm or direct threats to public safety, we will report the case to law enforcement bodies as permitted by local laws. Help keep our CraGee App community safe As an important part of the CraGee App community, if you see content that you believe violates any of the Community Guidelines, please help us by using CraGee App built-in reporting buttons. We have a dedicated team to review all the content flagged by our users, 24/7, and take proper action as quickly as possible. If you have further concerns, please contact crageeapp@gmail.com.
User Agreement This User Agreement (the “Agreement”) govern your use of CraGee App (“Platform”), including all features. By using the Services, you agree to be bound by the Agreement. Please take the time to read them carefully. User of the Services You must be mature to use the Service. If you are using the Service on behalf of a company, organization or other legal entity, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind such entity to the Agreement.
Posting Content CraGee App is building a community where people can get closer to each other. We expect our users express themselves and share content responsibly on the Platform.
You shall not post, upload, transmit, or share any information that:
violates the Agreement, Community Guidelines and other terms and policies that apply to your use of the Platform.\n is unlawful, discriminatory, fraudulent, harassing, or otherwise grossly harmful.\n harm minors in any way.\n infringes or violates someone else’s right, including but not limited to patent, trademark, copyright or other proprietary rights.\n We will remove any content we find in violation of the above, we may also terminate your account for sever violation. Content on the Platform Any user content will be considered non-confidential and non-proprietary.\n
You shall be solely responsible for your own content and the consequences of submitting and publishing your content on the Services.\n We do not endorse any content submitted to the Services by any user or any opinion, recommendation, or advice expressed therein, any use or reliance on any content obtained through the Service is at your own risk. Any views and opinions expressed by users on the Platform do not necessarily reflect the policy or position of the Platform.\n
We reserve the right to remove content that violates The Agreement, Community Guidelines and other policies that apply to your use of the Service.\n
Rights of the Content You retain all ownership rights in the content you post and share on the Platform, and nothing in the Agreement restrain the rights you have to your own content. In consideration of providing the Service, when you post or share content that is protected by intellectual property rights, you hereby grant us an unconditional, irrevocable, non-exclusive, royalty-free, fully transferable, assignable, sub-licensable, perpetual worldwide license to host, use, modify, translate, adapt, reproduce, make derivative works of, publish and/or transmit your content. including but not limited to advertising, marketing and promoting and redistributing part or all of the Services (and derivative works thereof) in any formats and through any channels.\n When you post your content through the Service, you agree and represent that you own that content or you have received permission from the owner of any part of the content submitted to the Services. Use of the Service The features of our Services may change from time to time, at our own discretion, including but not limited to: increasing or removing any feature within the Service, restraining you or users generally from accessing certain features, removing or refusing to distribute any content on the Platform.
You may not: modify, adapt, translate, reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile or create any derivative works based on the Services, including any files, tables or documentation (or any portion thereof) or determine or attempt to determine any source code, algorithms, methods or techniques embodied the Platform or any derivative works thereof; distribute, license, transfer or sell, in whole or in part, any of the Services or any derivative works thereof; market, rent or lease the Services for a fee or charge, or use the Platform to advertise or perform any commercial solicitation; interfere with or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Services, disrupt our website or any networks connected to the Services, or bypass any measures we may use to prevent or restrict access to the Services; incorporate the Platform or any portion thereof into any other program or product. use automated scripts to collect information from or otherwise interact with the Services; use or attempt to use another’s account, service or system without authorization from the user, or create a false identity on the Services; use the Services to upload, transmit, distribute, store or otherwise make available in any way files that contain viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs or other material that is malicious or technologically harmful; We reserve the right, at any time and without prior notice, to remove or disable access to content at our discretion for any reason. Some of the reasons we may remove or disable access to content may include finding the content objectionable, in violation of The Agreement, or otherwise harmful to the Services or our users.
Limitation of liability We are trying hard to bring you the best service and maintain a friendly community on the Platform. HOWEVER, THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED “AS IS” AND WE MAKE NO WARRANTY OR REPRESENTATION TO YOU THAT THEY WILL ALWAYS BE SAFE, SECURE, ERROR-FREE, UNDISRUPTED.\n
We do not control what users do or say on the Platform, and we are not responsible for their actions or conduct (whether online or offline) or any content they share.\n
OUR LIABILITY SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, AND UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCE WILL WE BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY LOST PROFITS, REVENUES, INFORMATION, OR DATA, OR CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, EXEMPLARY, PUNITIVE, OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE AGREEMENT.\n
Other Terms 1. Changes of the terms\n We amend the terms of the Agreement from time to time, for instance when we update the functionality of our Services or when there are regulatory changes. We will use commercially reasonable efforts to generally notify all users of any material changes to the Agreement, such as through a notice on our Platform. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must stop accessing or using the Services.\n
2. Suspension or termination account\n 3.To access or use some of our Services, you must create an account with us. You agree that you are solely responsible for the activity that occurs under your account.
We reserve the right to suspend or disable your user account at any time if in our reasonable opinion you have failed to comply with any of the provisions of the Agreement.\n
4. Parental Consent\n In addition, if you are under the age of 18, you confirm that you possess legal parental or guardian consent for accessing or using the Platform, and are fully able and competent to enter into, abide by, and comply with the Agreement.\n
5. No Waiver\n Our failure to insist upon or enforce any provision of the Agreement shall not be construed as a waiver of any provision or right.\n
6.If any court of law, having jurisdiction to decide on this matter, rules that any provision of the Agreement is invalid, then that provision will be removed from the Agreement without affecting the rest of the Agreement, and the remaining provisions of the Agreement will continue to be valid and enforceable.
Contact You can reach us at crageeapp@gmail.com.
Privacy Policy Welcome to CraGee App (the “Platform”). The Platform is developed for free expression of thoughts and life moments of our users. We respect and are committed to protecting your privacy.\n This policy sets out the basis on which any personal data we collect from you, or that you provide to us, will be processed by us. Please read the following carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it. By accessing or using our services, applications, you are accepting and consenting to the practices described in this policy.
1. The Types of Personal Data We Use
We may collect and use the following information about you:
• Information you give us. You may give us information about you by accessing or using our Services or by corresponding with us by phone, e-mail or otherwise. This includes information you provide when you register for and/or use the Platform, such as your customer profile, information about your device, your browsing records, the comments you make on our Platform. The information you give us may include your name, address, email address, telephone number. It also includes information that you give to us, such as a picture, video or other file type that you may choose to access through or post on our Platform.
• Metadata. When you upload a picture, video or other file type to the Platform (“User Content”), you automatically upload certain metadata that is connected to the User Content. In essence, metadata describes other data and provides information about your User Content that will not always be evident to the viewer. In connection with your file the metadata can describe how, when and by whom the piece of User Content was collected and how that content is formatted. It further includes information such as your account name that enables other users to trace back the file to your user account. • Information from third parties. We may receive information if you use any of the other websites we operate or other Services we provide. 2. How We Use Your Personal Data We will use the information we collect about you in the following ways: \n • to administer the Platform (i.e. to provide our Services to you) and for internal operations, including troubleshooting, data analysis, testing, research, statistical and survey purposes and to solicit your feedback; • to allow you to participate in interactive features of the Platform, when you choose to do so;\n • to personalize the content you receive and provide you with tailored content that will be of interest to you;\n • to improve and develop our Platform and conduct product development;\n • to make suggestions and recommendations to you and other users of the Platform about goods or services that will interest you or them;\n • to provide you with your profile information to send to anyone you choose and to enable you to participate on the Platform and interact with other users;\n • to show you content that is similar to content you liked or interacted with (by commenting and/or watching the content), content from your region as well as content from users you follow;\n • to promote the Services and use information that you give to us, such as User Content that you can choose to post on our Platform, as part of our advertising and marketing campaigns to promote the Platform;\n • to help us detect abuse, fraud, and illegal activity on the Platform;\n • to notify you about changes to our Services;\n • to communicate with you.\n • to provide you with user support;\n • to enforce our terms, conditions and policies;\n It is in our legitimate interests to promote the Platform, and by agreeing to comply with this policy you agree that we may use information that you give to us, such as User Content that you may choose to post on our Platform, as part of our advertising and marketing campaigns to promote the Platform.
3. The Security of Your Personal Data
We take steps to ensure that your information is treated securely and in accordance with this policy. Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we will do our best to protect your information, for example, by encryption, we cannot guarantee the security of your information transmitted through the Platform; any transmission is at your own risk.
We have appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk of varying likelihood and severity for the rights and freedoms of you and other users. We maintain these technical and organizational measures and will amend them from time to time to improve the overall security of our systems. 4. Data Retention We use the following criteria to determine the period for which we will keep your information:\n
our contractual obligations and rights in relation to the information involved; legal obligation(s) under applicable law(s) and regulations to retain data for a certain period of time; statute of limitations under applicable law(s); our legitimate business purposes; and disputes or potential disputes.\n We will not retain sensitive personal data or information for longer than is required for the purposes for which such information may be lawfully used or is otherwise required under any law for the time being in force.\n
After you have terminated your use of our Services, we can store your information in an aggregated and anonymized format. Notwithstanding the foregoing, we can also retain any personal information as reasonably necessary to comply with our legal obligations, allow us to resolve and litigate disputes, and to enforce our agreements.
5. Information Relating to Children The Platform is not developed for children. Children are not allowed to use the Platform or register an account on the Platform. If we become aware that personal data has been collected from a chil, we will delete this information and terminate the person’s account. If you believe that we may have personal data about or collected from a child under the age of 13, please contact us at crageeapp@gmail.com.
6. Complaints In the event that you wish to make a complaint about how we process your personal data, please contact us in the first instance at crageeapp@gmail.com and we will endeavour to deal with your request as soon as possible. This is without prejudice to your right to launch a claim with your data protection authority or follow the dispute resolution process provided in the Terms of Service.
7. Changes We will use commercially reasonable efforts to generally notify all users of any material changes to this policy, such as through a notice on our Platform, however, you should look at this policy regularly to check for such changes. Your continued access to or use of the Services after the date of the updated policy constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy. If you do not agree to the updated policy, you must stop accessing or using the Services.
8. Contact Questions, comments and requests regarding this policy are welcomed and should be addressed to CraGee App at email address of crageeapp@gmail.com.

Why pay for the private groups ?
• Become a exclusive member of the group.\n • Do private group chat with authentic members of the group.\n • Make new friends with same interests.\n • use the different services offered by the group.\n • Get rid of ads.
\u20B9 25 \u20B9 59 Verification Charge
Why pay for the blue tick Verification?
• The blue verified badge on CraGee App lets people know that an account of public interest is authentic.\n • An account may be verified if it is determined to be an account of public interest. Typically this includes accounts maintained by users in music, acting, fashion, government, politics, religion, journalism, media, sports, business, and other key interest areas.\n • CraGee App is offering blue tick for everyone irrespective of social status after paying the verification charge\n • A verified badge does not imply an endorsement by CraGee App .\n
What is CraGee App? CraGee App is a messaging app with a focus on speed and security.It is super fast and simple to use.\n\n • you can use CraGee App on all your devices at the same time. your messages synchronise any number of your phone,tablet or computers.\n •with CraGee App you can send messages, photos and create groups,personal pages,personal account.
Who is CraGee App for? CraGee App is for everyone who wants fast and reliable messaging and calls. Anyone can make public and private group for efficient transfer of information for free.public groups can be joined by anyone.private groups can be joined by everyone after the payment of required group joining fee. How old is CraGee App? CraGee App for Android was launched in July 1,2020.The Alpha version of CraGee App for Android officially launched on February 2020. Which devices can I use ? You can use CraGee App on smartphone(Android (4.1 and up)) and tablet. We are developing the web version of CraGee App and it will be available soon. Where is CraGee App based?
